text: Futhi ngokungangabazeki uMvelinqangi wasigcina isethembiso sakhe kunina ngesikhathi nibabulala ngemvume yakhe, naze nalahlekelwa umdlandla futhi naphikisana ngomyalelo (enaniwunikiwe) nangahloniphi emuva kokuba esenikhombisile lokho enikuthandayo phakathi kwenu, kukhona abathanda lomhlaba futhi phakathi kwenu kukhona abathanda impilo yakwelizayo, ngakho- ke wabe eseyaniqhelelanisa kubona ukuze anivivinye futhi usenithethelele, uMvelinqangi ungumnini womusa (kubantu) abakholwayo
